document_data.caption: A giant praying mantis with its wings extended.
document_data.name: Giant Praying Mantis
document_data.mainbody: '''Giant praying mantises''', also called '''gargantuan praying mantises''', were larger versions of [[praying mantis]]es.
document_data.Description: Giant praying mantises, like their smaller cousins, were camouflaged to look like the leaves of plants.
document_data.Combat: These carnivorous insects could stand motionless, hidden in foliage, until they struck out silently on approaching prey. They gripped their prey tightly in their claws and then bit down with their mandibles.

Ecology.Habitats:
In [[Faerûn]] they could be found in the forest of [[Cormanthor]]. Beyond Faerûn, they could be found in parts of [[Kara-Tur]]. 

Beyond [[Toril]], they were among the most dangerous predators of equatorial [[Karpri]].
Ecology.Relationships: The gargantuan praying mantises of Cormanthor were the primary predators of the forest's [[giant stag beetle]]s.
